text: Fritz and Friederike () is a 1952 West German comedy film directed by Géza von Bolváry and starring Liselotte Pulver, Albert Lieven, and Margarete Haagen. The film's sets were designed by Heinrich Beisenherz and Alfred Bütow. ==Cast== == References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1952 films Category:1952 comedy films Category:German comedy films Category:West German films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Géza von Bolváry Category:Cross-dressing in film
title: Fritz and Friederike
